Owlhawk raises his hands.

Owlhawk:  Don't you reconize my voice.  I used to be
Sunhawk, but things have changed since then, and I
don't intend to let Predicon scum like that continue
to exist, even as helpless sparks.

OOC: Good point, let's say he wandered into the room
looking for Talos, and his scanners picked up the
spark.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok, that was a fair post so I'll go with it,
> but what made his suddenly go looking in the room
> and find the spark?
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> The safe explodes from the shot, and spark fades
> into nothing. The memories and essense of everything
> that DrillBit was no longer exists. He is
> terminated. Like all transformers his "ghost" goes
> to the Cybertron master computer, Vector Sigma, or
> as some call it, the Matrix.
> 
> ::Kup::
> 
> He wasn't far when he heard an explosion in the lab.
> 
> "What on Cybertron?"
> 
> He heads back into the room, and sees Owlhawk with
> hsi weapons aimed at the safe.
> 
> "I dont know who the hell you are, but you just
> destroyed part of my lab, and my property."
> 
> Kup draws his plasma rifle from subspace, and aimes
> at Owlhawk's head.
> 
> "And as former security chief of Autobot City, i see
> another violation. You just fired a weapon without
> authorization within a Maximal ship. Your under
> arrest. Please come with me."
> 
> Kup motions towards the door with his weapon.
>
